title: Millwall in talks with Derby over loan deal for Jason Shackell
description: Millwall are in talks with Derby over a loan deal for defender Jason Shackell, according to Sky sources.
content: Manager Neil Harris is keen to strengthen his defensive options with Byron Webster likely to miss the rest of the season with a knee injury.Shackell, who has less than six months remaining on his current contract, is yet to feature for Derby in the Sky Bet Championship this season.The 34-year-old has been restricted to just two appearances in the Carabao Cup, the last of which came in September, with manager Gary Rowett preferring to select Richard Keogh and Curtis Davies in the centre-back positions.Shackell, who began his career at Norwich, has also spent time at Wolves, Doncaster and Barnsley.
